Text.val: -- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
04.02.2013 SH SCR17678 I/O properties: Changed CharSet = UTF-8 back to Ansi
22.04.2009 MKO SCR14463 Change call messagebox program for other
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
search for the first filename which we can use for the output file ...
no more valid output files. Operating has to clean output directory
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs

ExpSyntax.val: 'old files must be removed from IFS:'&Trim ({0,6})

SQL_STMT_U.val: select debh_no,debh_hadr_name1,dhic_id,op,limitf from (select debh_no,debh_hadr_name1,t1.op,t1.limitf from :1/debh,(select debc_debh,decimal(sum(debb_actinvah),13,2) as op,decimal(sum(debc_financelimith),13,2) as limitf from :1/debc,:1/debb where debc_no=debb_debc_no and (debb_actinvah>=50000 and debc_financelimith>=50000) group by debc_debh) as t1 where t1.debc_debh=debh_no) as tb1 inner join (select tp2.dhic_debh,tp2.dhic_id from (select dhic_debh from :1/dhic where dhic_infs_code='N' group by dhic_debh having count(*)=1) as tp1,:1/dhic as tp2 where tp1.dhic_debh=tp2.dhic_debh and tp2.dhic_infs_code='N') as tb2 on tb1.debh_no=tb2.dhic_debh order by tb1.debh_no;

Text.val: Determines file name for output file. The pattern for this file is BnnHAHEL.xml
where nn is a sequence number. We search for the first name where the file does
